definition: a toilet powder made of purified talc and usually scented
details:
noun
- a toilet powder made of purified talc and usually scented
= synonyms: talcum powder
- a fine grained mineral having a soft soapy feel and consisting of hydrated magnesium silicate
= example: a fine grained mineral having a soft soapy feel and consisting of hydrated magnesium silicate
= synonyms: talc
